summary: Kay Denham, romanced in Paris by friends Gene and George, can't figure out why George disapproves of Gene.
cast: Claudette Colbert|Melvyn Douglas|Robert Young|Lee Bowman|Mona Barrie|George Davis|Fritz Feld|Rudolph Anders|Alexander Cross|George Sorel|Louis LaBey|Egon Brecher|Hans Joby|Jacques Vanaire|Eugene Borden|Albert Pollet|Francisco Marán|Yola d'Avril|Joe Thoben|Gennaro Curci|Jean De Briac|Francisco Moreno|Sam Ash|Fernando García|Charles F. Haas|Arthur Hurni|Otto Jehly|Jacques Lory|Priscilla Moran|Alberto Morin|Roman Novins|Joe Ploski|Alexander Schoenberg|Gloria Williams
title: La encontré en París
